definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Concreting technology for the box girders and construction method for the prestressing system are dealt with as well.
sentences.chinese: 并介绍了箱梁混凝土的浇注工艺及预应力施工的方法。

sentences.english: In magazine also appeared, Japan casting machine is low efficiency and needs improving.
sentences.chinese: 杂志上也登过，日本浇注机效率低，需改进。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the influence of calcium treatment on the castability of continuous casting molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 分析讨论了钙处理对连铸钢浇注性能的影响。

sentences.english: The design of running system according to Large Orifice Discharge was used in practice.
sentences.chinese: 根据大孔出流理论设计的浇注系统符合实际生产。

sentences.english: Square slabs were cut from cubes cast with various aggregate sizes .
sentences.chinese: 从具有不同骨料粒度的立方浇注块中切出方形板块。

sentences.english: The zero current transformer of the type LXK is casting resin and indoor product.
sentences.chinese: 本型零序电流互感器为环氧树脂浇注户内型产品。

sentences.english: The effect of pouring temperature on the microstructure of chilled iron camshaft was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了浇注温度对激冷铸铁凸轮轴组织性能的影响。

sentences.english: Service time of covers of arc furnaces made by way of casting is more than 150 heats.
sentences.chinese: 浇注成型的电弧炉盖，单盖寿命在150炉次以上。

sentences.english: The slag resistance of magnesia - zircon castable was investigated by crucible test.
sentences.chinese: 采用坩埚法研究了镁锆质浇注料的抗渣性。

sentences.english: For example, the massive concrete base mat of OL3 was poured in one go, which caused significant problems; so much so that the Flamanville mat was poured in two sessions.
sentences.chinese: 例如，大规模OL3浇注混凝土造成了重大的问题。

sentences.english: Sillimanite refractory castable is good in use at combustion zone in CFB boilers.
sentences.chinese: 硅线石耐火浇注料适用于流化床锅炉的燃烧部位。

sentences.english: The reason for feeding effect improvement of the gating system is analyzed preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 对该浇注系统提高补缩效果的原因进行了初步分析。

sentences.english: Under the precondition that no cold shut occurs, it creates conditions to decrease pouring temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在不产生冷隔的前提下，为降低浇注温度创造了条件。

sentences.english: Liquid adobe mixture can be poured into containers called molds.
sentences.chinese: 液态土混合物能被浇注到称作模具的容器内。

sentences.english: It is further proposed to pour glass glue for the sealing during the process.
sentences.chinese: 并提出工艺实施过程浇注玻璃胶密封。

sentences.english: The emphasis of discussion lies in slag resistance of castable.
sentences.chinese: 着重对浇注料的抗渣性进行了讨论。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
